article_title: Israel launches intense air strikes in Lebanon against Hezbollah.
sentence: At  least  10  people,  including  five  children,  were  killed  in  an  Israeli  air  strike  yesterday  after  Lebanese  militant  group  Hezbollah  killed  a  soldier  in  Israel  on  Tuesday.
